revised_title: Researches on the Composition of Blue Derivatives of Tertiary Monamines Derived from Cinchonine
tldr: The author investigates the composition of blue derivatives of tertiary monamines derived from cinchonine, focusing on the iodide compounds and their properties. The study includes the synthesis and analysis of various compounds, such as iodide of amyllepidyl-ammonium and its isomers, as well as the formation of platinum-salts and other salts.
